title: FullText list of facets
description: The facets output returned by the fulltext search

subjectFacet.description: Subject facet generated using the Solr field topicStr. In the front-end, this is the field name Subject.

authorFacet.description: Author facet generated using the Solr field authorStr. In the front-end, this is the field name Author.

languageFacet.description: Language facet generated using the Solr field language008_full. In the front-end, this is the field name Language.

placeofPublicationFacet.description: Place of publication facet generated using the Solr field countryOfPubStr. In the front-end, this is the field name Place of Publication.

dateofPublicationFacet.description: Date of publication facet generated using the Solr field bothPublishDateRange. In the front-end, this is the field name Date of Publication.

originalFormatFacet.description: Original format facet generated using the Solr field format. In the front-end, this is the field name Original Format.

originalLocationFacet.description: Original location facet generated using the Solr field htsource. In the front-end, this is the field name Original Location.
